name: Project1_pixel
description:
My project. (in development) v3
  • A - move left
  • D - move right
  • Space bar - jump
  • Ctrl + movement keys - run (left/right)

How to slide on the wall?

  • Jump on the wall
  • and hold movement key in the direction where the character climbed up the wall

How to look around?

  • press right button on your mouse (you will see white dot)
  • and drag around the screen, it will follow your mouse and you will be able look around in radius 5 unit around character.
